poem:
Title: "The Current of Cuts"

"Mansfield, martyr of austerity," 
Chants the chorus of the scant.
Off the scale, demands of clarity,
Drowned for want of £27,000's grant.
The council counts the cost, in certainty,
Of cutting lifelines taut and tanned,
And Citizens Advice, in hurried plea,
Is lost in the wash of a straitened hand.
